trans-unit.source: Provides data for the *MethodName*<see langword="Completed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para el evento *MethodName*<see langword="Completed" />.

trans-unit.source: When using the [event-based asynchronous pattern](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-eap.md) for asynchronous operations, a Windows Forms form or control initiates an asyncronous operation by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.RunWorkerAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se usa el [modelo asincrónico basado en evento](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-eap.md) para operaciones asincrónicas, un formulario de Windows Forms o un control inicia una operación asincrónica mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.RunWorkerAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The method in turn raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.DoWork?displayProperty=nameWithType> event asynchronously and passes it a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs> instance.
trans-unit.target: El método a la vez lanza el <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.DoWork?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos asincrónicamente y le pasa un <xref:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs> instancia.

trans-unit.source: If the asychronous operation returns a value, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.DoWork?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler typically assigns it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs.Result?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Si la operación asincrónica devuelve un valor, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.DoWork?displayProperty=nameWithType> controlador de eventos normalmente lo asigna a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs.Result?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: When the asynchronous operation completes, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.RunWorkerCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised and is passed a <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs> instance that contains information about the status of the operation (whether it was cancelled, faulted, or completed successfully).
trans-unit.target: Cuando se completa la operación asincrónica, la <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.RunWorkerCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento se produce y se pasa un <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs> instancia que contiene información sobre el estado de la operación (si se ha cancelado, con errores o se completó correctamente).

trans-unit.source: If it completed successfully, its <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs.Result> property contains the value returned by the asynchronous operation and previously assigned to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs.Result?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Si se ha completado correctamente, su <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs.Result> propiedad contiene el valor devuelto por la operación asincrónica y previamente asignados a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs.Result?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this class has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource.SharedState>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> atributo aplicado a esta clase tiene las siguientes <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> valor de propiedad: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource.SharedState>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: El atributo <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> no afecta a las aplicaciones de escritorio (que normalmente se inician haciendo doble clic en un icono, escribiendo un comando o introduciendo una dirección URL en el explorador).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte el <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> clase o [programación de SQL Server y atributos de protección de Host](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo de código, se muestra el uso de <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger sample for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo forma parte de un ejemplo más extenso para el <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker> clase.

trans-unit.source: The result of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Resultado de una operación asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Any error that occurred during the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Cualquier error que se haya producido durante la operación asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the asynchronous operation was canceled.
trans-unit.target: Valor que indica si se canceló la operación asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the result of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que representa el resultado de una operación asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the result of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa el resultado de una operación asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.RunWorkerCompleted> event handler should always check the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> properties before accessing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Su <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.RunWorkerCompleted> siempre debería comprobar el controlador de eventos el <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> y <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> propiedades antes de acceder a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: If an exception was raised or if the operation was canceled, accessing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Si se produce una excepción o si se canceló la operación, obtener acceso a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> propiedad provoca una excepción.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.RunWorkerCompleted> event to handle the result of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra el uso de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.RunWorkerCompleted> eventos para controlar el resultado de una operación asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker> clase.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error" /> is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error" /> no es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> property holds a reference to <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error" />.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> contiene una referencia a <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled" /> es <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the user state.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que representa el estado del usuario.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the user state.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa el estado del usuario.
